snippet: Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford is hoping his team can stifle a resurgent Manchester United in the Premier League on Monday and help him keep back-to-back clean sheets for the first time this season....
lead_paragraph: Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford is hoping his team can stifle a resurgent Manchester United in the Premier League on Monday and help him keep back-to-back clean sheets for the first time this season.

headline.main: Black Cat Pickford Targets Old Trafford Clean Sheet
headline.print_headline: Black Cat Pickford Targets Old Trafford Clean Sheet
